content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experience, but there are some tour companies and guides that specialize in providing guided tours of Oradea Fortress that you might consider. Some of these include:

1. Oradea Guides Association: This association consists of licensed guides that offer guided tours of the fortress, amongst other attractions in Oradea. Visitors can choose from a range of tour options, including exploring the fortress's main attractions. 2. Medieval Touring: Medieval Touring offers a guided tour of the fortress that explores the fortress's history and architecture, including the Palace of the Crisander Family, the fortress towers, and more. 3. EvoMedievalis: Providing visitors with an interactive and experiential tour of the fortress, EvoMedievalis offers various cultural and entertainment programs with qualified guides, including guided tours. 4. Oradea Daily Tours: Providing daily tours of Oradea's top attractions, including the fortress, Oradea Daily Tours offers visitors a knowledgeable and professional guided tour of the fortress. These are just a few options, but there are many more tour companies and guides out there that offer guided tours of Oradea Fortress. Visitors should research and compare the offerings of various companies and guides to choose the one that meets their needs and interests.
